title: 请问you are already connected to this server这个提示在哪里汉化
author: RcietL
txt_content:
请问you are already connected to this server这个提示在哪里汉化

在线等

replies.author: Evil-dawn
replies.txt_content: 进服的提升吗？ 小兄弟

replies.author: 绝望的枫岚
replies.txt_content: 这个是客户端的提示  你可以去config  看看

跨服端核心messages.properties这里这里面汉化
记住用解压打开
